verses.verse: שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear נָ֕א <S%H4994><s%> now אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> ye now what the LORD אֹמֵ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saith ק֚וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise רִ֣יב <S%H7378><s%> contend אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> before הֶהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> thou before the mountains וְתִשְׁמַ֥עְנָה <S%H8085><s%> hear הַגְּבָע֖וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and let the hills קוֹלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6963><s%> thy voice

שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear הָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> ye O mountains אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רִ֣יב <S%H7379><s%> controversy יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְהָאֵתָנִ֖ים <S%H386><s%> and ye strong מֹ֣סְדֵי <S%H4146><s%> foundations אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because רִ֤יב <S%H7379><s%> hath a controversy לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> with his people וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> with Israel יִתְוַכָּֽח׃ <S%H3198><s%> and he will plead

עַמִּ֛י <S%H5971><s%> O my people מֶה־ <S%H4100><s%> what עָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> what have I done לְךָ֖ וּמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> and how הֶלְאֵתִ֑יךָ <S%H3811><s%> unto thee? and wherein have I wearied עֲנֵ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> thee? testify בִֽי׃

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Indeed הֶעֱלִתִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5927><s%> For I brought thee up מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וּמִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> thee out of the house עֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> of servants פְּדִיתִ֑יךָ <S%H6299><s%> and redeemed וָאֶשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> and I sent לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> thee Moses אַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וּמִרְיָֽם׃ <S%H4813><s%> and Miriam

עַמִּ֗י <S%H5971><s%> O my people זְכָר־ <S%H2142><s%> remember נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What יָּעַ֗ץ <S%H3289><s%> consulted בָּלָק֙ <S%H1111><s%> now what Balak מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וּמֶה־ <S%H4100><s%> and what עָנָ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> answered אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בִּלְעָ֣ם <S%H1109><s%> and what Balaam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בְּע֑וֹר <S%H1160><s%> of Beor מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַשִּׁטִּים֙ <S%H7851><s%> him from Shittim עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> unto Gilgal לְמַ֕עַן <S%H4616><s%> So דַּ֖עַת <S%H3045><s%> that ye may know צִדְק֥וֹת <S%H6666><s%> the righteousness יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

בַּמָּה֙ <S%H4100><s%> what אֲקַדֵּ֣ם <S%H6923><s%> Wherewith shall I come before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִכַּ֖ף <S%H3721><s%> [and] bow לֵאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God מָר֑וֹם <S%H4791><s%> myself before the high הַאֲקַדְּמֶ֣נּוּ <S%H6923><s%> come בְעוֹל֔וֹת <S%H5930><s%> him with burnt offerings בַּעֲגָלִ֖ים <S%H5695><s%> with calves בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> With שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> of a year

הֲיִרְצֶ֤ה <S%H7521><s%> be pleased יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Will the LORD בְּאַלְפֵ֣י <S%H505><s%> with thousands אֵילִ֔ים <S%H352><s%> of rams בְּרִֽבְב֖וֹת <S%H7233><s%> [or] with ten thousands נַֽחֲלֵי־ <S%H5158><s%> of rivers שָׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> anointing הַאֶתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> add בְּכוֹרִי֙ <S%H1060><s%> my firstborn פִּשְׁעִ֔י <S%H6588><s%> [for] my transgression פְּרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> the fruit בִטְנִ֖י <S%H990><s%> of my body חַטַּ֥את <S%H2403><s%> [for] the sin נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> He

הִגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> He hath shewed לְךָ֛ אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> thee O man מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what טּ֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> what [is] good וּמָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> and what יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> and what doth the LORD דּוֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> require מִמְּךָ֗ <S%H4480><s%> at כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> But עֲשׂ֤וֹת <S%H6213><s%> of thee but to do מִשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> justly וְאַ֣הֲבַת <S%H160><s%> and to love חֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy וְהַצְנֵ֥עַ <S%H6800><s%> humbly לֶ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> walk עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> angels פ

ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD'S לָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> unto the city יִקְרָ֔א <S%H7121><s%> crieth וְתוּשִׁיָּ֖ה <S%H8454><s%> and [the man of] wisdom יִרְאֶ֣ה <S%H3372><s%> to fear שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> thy name שִׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> hear מַטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> ye the rod וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who יְעָדָֽהּ׃ <S%H3259><s%> and who hath appointed

ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> yet הַאִשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> burning בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house רָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked אֹצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> yet the treasures רֶ֑שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> of wickedness וְאֵיפַ֥ת <S%H374><s%> measure רָז֖וֹן <S%H7332><s%> and the scant זְעוּמָֽה׃ <S%H2194><s%> [that is] abominable

הַאֶזְכֶּ֖ה <S%H2135><s%> Shall I count [them] pure בְּמֹ֣אזְנֵי <S%H3976><s%> balances רֶ֑שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> with the wicked וּבְכִ֖יס <S%H3599><s%> and with the bag אַבְנֵ֥י <S%H68><s%> stones מִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> of deceitful

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> him עֲשִׁירֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H6223><s%> For the rich men מָלְא֣וּ <S%H4390><s%> thereof are full חָמָ֔ס <S%H2555><s%> of violence וְיֹשְׁבֶ֖יהָ <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants דִּבְּרוּ־ <S%H1696><s%> thereof have spoken שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> lies וּלְשׁוֹנָ֖ם <S%H3956><s%> and their tongue רְמִיָּ֥ה <S%H7423><s%> [is] deceitful בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6310><s%> in their mouth

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I הֶחֱלֵ֣יתִי <S%H2470><s%> Therefore also will I make [thee] sick הַכּוֹתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5221><s%> in smiting הַשְׁמֵ֖ם <S%H8074><s%> thee in making [thee] desolate עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because חַטֹּאתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2403><s%> because of thy sins

אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> You תֹאכַל֙ <S%H398><s%> Thou shalt eat וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׂבָּ֔ע <S%H7646><s%> but not be satisfied וְיֶשְׁחֲךָ֖ <S%H3445><s%> and thy casting down בְּקִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7130><s%> [shall be] in the midst וְתַסֵּג֙ <S%H5253><s%> of thee and thou shalt take hold וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תַפְלִ֔יט <S%H6403><s%> but shalt not deliver וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and what תְּפַלֵּ֖ט <S%H6403><s%> and [that] which thou deliverest לַחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> to the sword אֶתֵּֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> will I give up

אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You תִזְרַ֖ע <S%H2232><s%> Thou shalt sow וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִקְצ֑וֹר <S%H7114><s%> but thou shalt not reap אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> You תִדְרֹֽךְ־ <S%H1869><s%> thou shalt tread זַ֙יִת֙ <S%H2132><s%> the olives וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> but will not תָס֣וּךְ <S%H5480><s%> but thou shalt not anoint שֶׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> thee with oil וְתִיר֖וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> and sweet wine וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִשְׁתֶּה־ <S%H8354><s%> but shalt not drink יָּֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> wine

וְיִשְׁתַּמֵּ֞ר <S%H8104><s%> are kept חֻקּ֣וֹת <S%H2708><s%> For the statutes עָמְרִ֗י <S%H6018><s%> of Omri וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> and all the works בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab וַתֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> walk בְּמֹֽעֲצוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4156><s%> in their counsels לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> Therefore תִּתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> that I should make אֹתְךָ֜ <S%H853><s%> לְשַׁמָּ֗ה <S%H8047><s%> thee a desolation וְיֹשְׁבֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants לִשְׁרֵקָ֔ה <S%H8322><s%> thereof an hissing וְחֶרְפַּ֥ת <S%H2781><s%> the reproach עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> of my people תִּשָּֽׂאוּ׃ <S%H5375><s%> therefore ye shall bear פ
